#define DECLARE_BOOLEAN_SWITCH ( name   ) 

Value:

bool name = false; \
        bool name##Proc( const tstring& command ) \
        { \
                char buf[ 6 ]; \
                sscanf( command.c_str(), "%*s %5s", buf ); \
                if ( stricmp( buf, "true" ) == 0 || strcmp( buf, "1" ) == 0 ) \
                        name = true; \
                else if ( stricmp( buf, "false" ) == 0 || strcmp( buf, "0" ) == 0 ) \
                        name = false; \
                else \
                        return false; \
                return true; \
        }
class header.
